name: Riverside Dr
description: The southern terminus of Riverside Drive, where the pristine asphalt gracefully yields to the gentle wilderness. The road becomes a charming dirt path here, inviting you into the serene embrace of the encroaching woods. Riverside Drive continues its journey to the north, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and charming homes. The air is still, broken only by the distant, contented hum of traffic and the occasional, cheerful chirping of a bird, a perfect farewell to the suburban dream.
